p.strong: Everything a player needs to use Aurora to play the Campaigns I am playing.

description.p: Some of this material was originally sourced from Wizard's of the Coast or other people.
I will try to properly annotate this source with wherever I get materials, but may miss things from time-to-time.
Thank you to everyone who worked on any of these things, you are all wonderful.
Wizard's of the Coast: Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
Wizard's of the Coast: Player's Handbook

setters.set: Aurora XML: Francis Sziebert, see description for contents
